description.narrative: The proposed revised PDO is: “to improve transport accessibility and mobility in Xi’an Municipality and enhance air quality monitoring of the urban transport system.”

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 1, Section IV | Description :A new Section IV is introduced as follows in Schedule 1 to the ProjectAgreement: “Section IV. Other Undertakings. By no later than December 31, 2014, the Project Implementing Entity shall have updatedthe Subsidiary Loan Agreement with IIC for the purpose of assisting the Project Implementing Entity in carrying out of the Projectactivities pursuant to Section 2.01(c) of this Agreement.” | Due Date :31-Dec-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II, para. A.1 and B.2 | Description :The borrower shall monitor adn evaluate the progress ofthe Project and report after each six-month period. | Due Date :15-Aug-2012
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II, para. A.2. | Description :The borrower shall furnish a report on the execution of theProject. | Due Date :15-Dec-2015
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II, para. B.3. | Description :The borrower shall have its Financial Statements audited andfurnish the audit to the Bank. | Due Date :30-Jun-2012

title.narrative: Component 6: Training and study tours in urban management.
Component 1: New road interchanges to replace existing roundabouts on the First and Second Ring Roads.
Increase MV speed on the key corridors under the project (East GAte, South First Ring, Yuxiang Gate)
Component 3: Journey speeds for cars and buses on selected routes in MWC: average speed in km/h: Bei Dajie
Component 3: Journey speeds for cars and buses on selected routes in MWC: average speed in km/h: Dong Dajie
Component 3: Journey speeds for cars and buses on selected routes in MWC: average speed in km/h: Lianhu Rd.
Component 3: Journey speeds for cars and buses on selected routes in MWC: average speed in km/h: Nan Dajie
Component 3: Journey speeds for cars and buses on selected routes in MWC: average speed in km/h: Dongxi 5th Rd.
Component 3: Journey speeds for cars and buses on selected routes in MWC: average speed in km/h: Xi Dajie
Component 1: Huxian - Cross town (Dong Chen Lu to Lao Bin Lu) journey time across the railway line (mn)
Increase in number of vehicles receiving emissions testing
Component 4: Development and submission to the Xi’an Municipality of a plan to reduce vehicle emissions.
Component 4: Environmental management information system established and operational
Component 3: Area traffic control system installed.
Component 5: Han Chang'an Road Network in successful operation
Component 6: Completion of Accident analysis study.
Component 6: Completion of investment and debt risk control study.
Component 6: Completion of strategic planning study jointly by XMG UT Unit and consultant team.
Component 2: Number of days for maintenance
